alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:21AM MST until March 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts near and south of Brian Head. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along all mountain routes Saturday, including higher passes along I-15. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of up to 2 inches per hour are expected near and south of Brian Head this afternoon, along with southerly wind gusts up to 45 mph possible. This will create very low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
